room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mission: Breakout Lafayette in Lafayette (IN)
review: Did the "Bank Heist" room for our daughter's 20th birthday. So much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mission: Breakout Lafayette in Lafayette (IN)
review: My family went yesterday, completed "Bank Heist" (with just a few minutes to spare), and had a wonderful time. It was a fun game, and Eric was friendly, funny and welcoming. So glad to have this in our community, and we're looking forward to going back and doing a different game!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mission: Breakout Lafayette in Lafayette (IN)
review: We had a blast with the Bank Heist for my daughter's birthday. We will definitely be back to try out the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mission: Breakout Lafayette in Lafayette (IN)
review: We had an excellent time trying to complete the Bank Heist mission! It was the first escape room for three of our four players and it was everything we had hoped it would be! We will definitely be back!
